title: Miraijima
content:
Mori Calliope!!!!!!!

I never got the hype of Volume releases, but I remember back when Volume 100 dropped and Shueisha started doing those animated trailers and they were soo hyped, every since I got too into the Manga animation movies that you’d see constant promotional materials for.

Volume 106, revolving around Egghead was such a big release, featuring Mori and you’ve got me booking all the front seats for myself. I love the original bits of animation coupled with Mori’s adaptive voice, this is a masterpiece worth memorizing down to the last note.

One Piece and Mori sounds like a magical combination too good to believe but it’shere, and it’s magnificent.
